about.certificate: I am a graduate from <1>Epitech School</1>, and I have more than 3 years of experience.
about.passions: I am keen on WebDesign and WebDev.
about.qualities: My <1>best qualities</1> are: <2>independence, thoroughness, and curiosity.</2>

resume.ibaniDesc: Ibani: Company managing the exchange of money. MtPelerin: Company (future bank) which aims at the creation of digital account safe, free, fast. Improvement of the admin site. Update of the mobile application.Tools: Vue.js / React Native, Javascript / MacOS
resume.inattenduDesc: Event enterprise in presence and virtual. Site management (Vue.js). ZOOM master. Sound, video and light management.
resume.newAccessDesc: Multinational editor of banking software for private banks. Creation of a web application allowing to view a project as a node and a link (Force Layout). Automated log manager (several thousands of logs, parsed, then compiled into a single log according to the user's parameters).Tools: C, JavaScript(angular, d3.js), Html / Css, VisualStudio.
resume.masterDesc: The Grande Ecole program is Epitech's historical curriculum. It lasts 5 years and trains experts in computer science. It offers a dense and varied technical content, including a diversity of programming projects, and covering many languages that will allow the student to approach all new technologies with serenity.

about.startContent: 5 years ago I started creating content and sharing my passions:
